## clustermesh-apiserver clustermesh-dbg troubleshoot

Troubleshoot connectivity towards the local etcd kvstore

```
clustermesh-apiserver clustermesh-dbg troubleshoot [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --etcd-config string   Path to the etcd configuration (default "/var/lib/cilium/etcd-config.yaml")
  -h, --help                 help for troubleshoot
      --timeout duration     Timeout when checking connectivity to the etcd kvstore (default 5s)
```

### SEE ALSO

* [clustermesh-apiserver clustermesh-dbg](clustermesh-apiserver_clustermesh-dbg.md)	 - CLI for interacting with ClusterMesh
